nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -62,7 +62,7 @@ Updates every 10,000 rows scanned and upon completing a table.
 
 |[[connectors-strm-metric-maxqueuesizeinbytes_{context}]]<<connectors-strm-metric-maxqueuesizeinbytes_{context}, `MaxQueueSizeInBytes`>>
